summary: This is an email dated August 9, 2019, with the subject 'June Work Orders' and a list of maintenance tasks as attachments. The document appears to be a routine administrative communication regarding facility maintenance, possibly at a detention or correctional facility (MCC-New York).
keyFacts: The email is dated August 9, 2019, and references 'June Work Orders'.
The attached work orders include tasks like rewiring a fire alarm panel, replacing batteries, and reorganizing a video room.
The email mentions 'MCC-New York', which is likely the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
The document appears to be routine administrative correspondence related to facility maintenance.
No specific individuals are named in the provided text.
